global.followingstatus: Status updates fer <@727569067895947383> will automatically be sent here. To disable them, go ter yer Integrations settings fer this here channel.
global.notfollowingstatus: To be notified of <@727569067895947383>'s status updates, please type: `c;settings status` in the channel ye wish updates ter be posted in.

usernotfound.title: Error 404 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! That there user wasn't found or that there user hasn't interacted with CountBot before.

noserverpermission.title: Error 403 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It looks like ye don't have proper permissions ter run this here command. **Make sure ye have "Manage Server" permission.**

nochannelpermission.title: Error 403 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It looks like ye don't have proper permissions ter run this here command. **Make sure ye have "Manage Channel" permission.**

nodevpermission.title: Error 403 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It looks like ye don't have proper permissions ter run this here command. **Only bremea development staff can use this here command.**

nobotpermission.title: Error 403 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It looks like I don't have proper permissions ter run this here command. **Make sure I have "Manage Channel" permission and me role be higher than yer server's bot role.**

alreadyhaschannel.title: Error 403 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It looks like ye already have a countin' channel runnin' in this here server - {CHANNEL}. Currently, we limit servers ter one countin' channel at a time.

notacountingchannel.title: Error 400 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It doesn't look like this here be a countin' channel. **Make sure the last message sent be a valid, positive integer.**

embed.title: Ye bought: {ITEM}
description: A {ITEM} was bought via the [CountBot Shop](https://bremea.com/countbot/shop)
Hmm... it seems that there command doesn't exist. Check the spellin' and try again.

help.countonly: :warning: **This command can only be used in countin' channels.**
help.adminonly: :warning: **This command can only be members who have "Manage Channel" permissions.**
help.title: CountBot Help <:countbotpixel:800542958248001557>

mainmenu.title: CountBot Help <:countbotpixel:800542958248001557>
mainmenu.description: Use `c;h <command>` ter learn more about a command | **[Need help? Click here.](https://discord.gg/meWdwaJ)**

fields.name: Setup Commands
value: `c;new <number>` Creates a new channel where the goal be ter count ter a number.
`c;merge` Sets up the bot in an existin' countin' channel.

info.title: CountBot Information <:countbotpixel:800542958248001557>
info.description: CountBot be an easy to-use, highly configurable, and super fun minigame bot that manages a countin' channel.

noitems.title: Error 404 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It doesn't look like ye have any items in yer inventory. **Ye can buy items at the [CountBot Shop](https://bremea.com/countbot/shop).**

hasitems.title: Yer Inventory
hasitems.description: Ye can buy more items with `c;shop`

statements.togithub: Click on a language ter be taken ter the GitHub Repository.
statements.set: To set this here server's language, type the abbreviation.
statements.info: Type the language abbreviation fer more information.

description: English be the primary language and fully supported. Some commands may appear in English even though yer language be set ter another.
Please select a new language fer yer server.
If ye want ter contribute with translations in yer native language, join our [Support Server]({INVITE})
English be the primary language and fully supported. Some commands may appear in English even though yer language be set ter another.
Please provide a page number between **1** and **{TOTALPAGES}**.
Here be where ye can manage the language of <@727569067895947383>!
**Please contact us if ye'd like ter help!**
**Ahoy there! Thanks fer openin' this here page!**
The CountBot Team has devoted many hours ter bein' able ter support other languages. Please consider grabbin' the opportunity to help out!
**Please contact us if ye'd like ter help!**

notagoal.title: Error 400 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! Please enter a valid number fer the goal. Example: `c;merge 500`

setup.title: Count ter {GOAL}
description: **{USER} just setup CountBot in this here channel!**
The goal be ter count ter {GOAL} Can ye do it?

footer.text: Tip: Admins can make the challenge harder by changin' the slowmode.

milestones.title: Milestones {ACTION}
description: **Milestones have been {ACTION} fer this here countin' channel.** Ye can change this at any time by runnin' `c;milestones` again.

invalidnumber.title: Error 400 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! Please enter a valid number. Example: `c;new 500`

created.title: Countin' Channel Created
created.description: **Look, a brand new channel - {CHANNEL}!** The goal be ter count ter {GOAL}, can ye make it?

newmessage.rawtext: A wild countin' channel appeared! **Start countin' with 1.**
newmessage.title: Count ter {GOAL}
description: **{USER} just made a new countin' channel!**
The goal be ter count ter {GOAL}. Can ye do it?
newmessage.footer: Tip: Admins can make the challenge harder by changin' the slowmode.

invalidnumber.title: Error 400 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! Please enter a valid number that be higher than the current goal. Example: `c;setgoal 500`

extended.title: Goal extended
description: **The goal of this here channel been changed!** The new goal be ter count ter {GOAL}.

mainmenu.title: Click Here ter go ter the Shop üõí
description: Ye can do `c;shop [query]` ter search the shop fer items and get links ter buy them

noitemid.title: Error 400 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! Please enter an item id (run `c;inventory` to get a list of items in yer inventory and their IDs). Example: `c;use p-s5`

notininventory.title: Error 404 <:uhh:810311297936785439>
description: Shiver me timbers! It doesn't look like ye have any items in yer inventory that have the ID `{ITEM}` (ye can run `c;inventory` ter get a list of items in yer inventory and their IDs).

vote.title: Click here ter vote fer CountBot
